card.name: Ambuscade Shaman
card.text: Whenever Ambuscade Shaman or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, that creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Dash {3}{B}

card.name: Anafenza, Kin-Tree Spirit
card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, bolster 1.

card.name: Ancestral Statue
card.text: When Ancestral Statue enters the battlefield, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Anticipate
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Arashin Foremost
card.text: Double strike Whenever Arashin Foremost enters the battlefield or attacks, another target Warrior creature you control gains double strike until end of turn.

card.name: Arashin Sovereign
card.text: Flying When Arashin Sovereign dies, you may put it on the top or bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Artful Maneuver
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Rebound

card.name: Assault Formation
card.text: Each creature you control assigns combat damage equal to its toughness rather than its power. {G}: Target creature with defender can attack this turn as though it didn't have defender. {2}{G}: Creatures you control get +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Atarka Beastbreaker
card.text: Formidable - {4}{G}: Atarka Beastbreaker gets +4/+4 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

card.name: Atarka Efreet
card.text: Megamorph {2}{R} When Atarka Efreet is turned face up, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Atarka Monument
card.text: {T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool. {4}{R}{G}: Atarka Monument becomes a 4/4 red and green Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

card.name: Atarka Pummeler
card.text: Formidable - {3}{R}{R}: Each creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

card.name: Atarka's Command
card.text: Choose two - - Your opponents can't gain life this turn. - Atarka's Command deals 3 damage to each opponent. - You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. - Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain reach until end of turn.

card.name: Avatar of the Resolute

card.text: Whenever Blood-Chin Rager attacks, each Warrior creature you control can't be blocked this turn except by two or more creatures.

card.name: Coat with Venom
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+2 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.

card.name: Collected Company
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Commune with Lava
card.text: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

card.name: Contradict
card.text: Counter target spell. Draw a card.

card.name: Corpseweft
card.text: {1}{B}, Exile one or more creature cards from your graveyard: Put an X/X black Zombie Horror creature token onto the battlefield tapped, where X is twice the number of cards exiled this way.

card.name: Crater Elemental
card.text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice Crater Elemental: Crater Elemental deals 4 damage to target creature. Formidable - {2}{R}: Crater Elemental has base power 8 until end of turn. Activate this ability only if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater.

card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Cunning Breezedancer gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.text: Target player draws X cards and loses X life.

card.text: As long as you control exactly one creature, that creature gets +2/+0 and has deathtouch and lifelink.

card.text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn.

card.text: As an additional cost to cast Draconic Roar, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to target creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Draconic Roar, Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Dragon Hunter

card.name: Dragon Tempest

card.text: Target creature gets +0/+5 and gains reach until end of turn.

card.name: Sheltered Aerie
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color to your mana pool."

card.name: Shieldhide Dragon
Shorecrasher Elemental
Sibsig Icebreakers
card.text: When Sibsig Icebreakers enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.

card.name: Sidisi's Faithful
card.text: Exploit When Sidisi's Faithful exploits a creature, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Sidisi, Undead Vizier
card.text: Deathtouch Exploit When Sidisi, Undead Vizier exploits a creature, you may search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Sight Beyond Sight
card.text: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library. Rebound

card.name: Sight of the Scalelords
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control with toughness 4 or greater get +2/+2 and gain vigilance until end of turn.

card.name: Silkwrap
card.text: When Silkwrap enters the battlefield, exile target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less an opponent controls until Silkwrap leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Silumgar Assassin
Silumgar Butcher
card.text: Exploit When Silumgar Butcher exploits a creature, target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.name: Silumgar Monument
card.text: {T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool. {4}{U}{B}: Silumgar Monument becomes a 4/4 blue and black Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

card.name: Silumgar Sorcerer
card.text: Flash Flying Exploit When Silumgar Sorcerer exploits a creature, counter target creature spell.

card.name: Silumgar Spell-Eater
card.text: Megamorph {4}{U} When Silumgar Spell-Eater is turned face up, counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Silumgar's Command
card.text: Choose two - - Counter target noncreature spell. - Return target permanent to its owner's hand. - Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. - Destroy target planeswalker.

card.name: Silumgar's Scorn
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Silumgar's Scorn, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Silumgar's Scorn, counter that spell instead.

card.name: Skywise Teachings
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you may pay {1}{U}. If you do, put a 2/2 blue Djinn Monk creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

card.name: Spidersilk Net
card.text: Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. Equip {2}

card.name: Sprinting Warbrute
card.text: Sprinting Warbrute attacks each turn if able. Dash {3}{R}

card.name: Stampeding Elk Herd
card.text: Formidable - Whenever Stampeding Elk Herd attacks, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.

card.text: Trample Megamorph {4}{R}{R}

Strongarm Monk
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Student of Ojutai
card.text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, you gain 2 life.

card.name: Sunbringer's Touch
card.text: Bolster X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Sunscorch Regent
card.text: Flying Whenever an opponent casts a spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Sunscorch Regent and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Surge of Righteousness
card.text: Destroy target black or red creature that's attacking or blocking. You gain 2 life.

card.name: Surrak, the Hunt Caller
card.text: Formidable - At the beginning of combat on your turn, if creatures you control have total power 8 or greater, target creature you control gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Swift Warkite
card.text: Flying When Swift Warkite enters the battlefield, you may put a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Taigam's Strike
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn and can't be blocked this turn. Rebound

card.name: Tail Slash
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

card.name: Tapestry of the Ages
card.text: {2}, {T}: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.

card.name: Thunderbreak Regent
card.text: Flying Whenever a Dragon you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, Thunderbreak Regent deals 3 damage to that player.

card.name: Tormenting Voice
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Tormenting Voice, discard a card. Draw two cards.

card.name: Tread Upon
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Twin Bolt
card.text: Twin Bolt deals 2 damage divided as you choose among one or two target creatures and/or players.

card.name: Ultimate Price
card.text: Destroy target monocolored creature.

card.name: Vandalize
card.text: Choose one or both - - Destroy target artifact. - Destroy target land.

card.name: Vial of Dragonfire

card.name: Virulent Plague
card.text: Creature tokens get -2/-2.

card.name: Void Squall
card.text: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. Rebound

card.name: Volcanic Rush
card.text: Attacking creatures get +2/+0 and gain trample until end of turn.

card.name: Volcanic Vision
card.text: Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Volcanic Vision deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature your opponents control. Exile Volcanic Vision.

card.name: Vulturous Aven
card.text: Flying Exploit When Vulturous Aven exploits a creature, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

card.text: When Youthful Scholar dies, draw two cards.

card.name: Zurgo Bellstriker
